briefdescription.para: Surface area that undergoes radiation pressure [m^2].
Front emissivity coefficient of the sail [-].
Back emissivity coefficient of the sail [-].
Front Lambertian coefficient of the sail [-].
Back lambertian coefficient of the sail [-].
Specular reflection coefficient of the sail [-].

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &sourceBody, const double area, const std::function< double(const double) > coneAngle, const std::function< double(const double) > clockAngle, const double frontEmissivityCoefficient, const double backEmissivityCoefficient, const double frontLambertianCoefficient, const double backLambertianCoefficient, const double reflectivityCoefficient, const double specularReflectionCoefficient, const std::vector< std::string > &occultingBodies=std::vector< std::string >(), const std::string &centralBody=std::string())
memberdef.name: SolarSailRadiationInterfaceSettings

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor Constructor
sourceBody
Name of body emitting the radiation.
area
Surface area that undergoes radiation pressure [m^2].
coneAngle
Function returning the current sail cone angle (in rad).
clockAngle
Function returning the current sail clock angle (in rad).
frontEmissivityCoefficient
Emissivity coefficient of the front of the sail [-].
backEmissivityCoefficient
Emissivity coefficient of the back of the sail [-].
frontLambertianCoefficient
Lambertian coefficient of the front of the sail [-].
backLambertianCoefficient
Lambertian coefficient of the back of the sail [-].
reflectivityCoefficient
Reflectivity coefficient of the sail [-].
specularReflectionCoefficient
Specular reflection coefficient of the sail [-].
occultingBodies
List of bodies causing (partial) occultation.
centralBody
Name of the central body.
